about_the_game:
Export Your Game!


Get this DLC to enabled exporting in Visual Novel Engine.

Here's what you get

  • Support the development of Visual Novel Engine!
  • Export your visual novel straight to Windows / Mac / Linux in just one click!
  • Cloud Saving / Loading for your standalone visual novel
  • Engine Updates on-the-fly
  • Absolutely NO reference to Visual Novel Engine in your exported game needed!
  • High-Priority feature additions!
  • Custom feature request for your game!
